庌庌庌

庌字的基本解释

庌
yǎ
马棚：“夏庌马。”
厅堂；客堂。
供过往宾客歇宿的房舍。

庌字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yǎ］
［《廣韻》五下切，上馬，疑。］
(1)庑，廊屋。
(2)大屋；厅堂；客堂。
(3)见“庌”。

庌字的康熙字典解释

【寅集下】【广字部】　庌； 康熙笔画：7； 页码：页343第28
【唐韻】五下切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】語下切，?牙上聲。【說文】廡也。【玉篇】舍也。【廣韻】㕔也。【釋名】大屋曰廡。幷冀人謂之庌。庌，正也，屋之正大者也。【六書故】廊廡四達之謂庌。【周禮·夏官·圉師】夏庌馬。【註】庌，廡也。廡所以庇馬涼也。　又【集韻】魚駕切【韻會】【正韻】五駕切，?牙去聲。義同。　又【集韻】牛加切，音牙。㡸庌，不齊也。

庌字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
庌字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Awkward
yǎ
Stable: "Xia Lama."
Hall; guest hall.
A house for past guests to sleep in.
Awkward
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yǎ］
["Guangyun" cut five times, mount on horse, doubt. ]
(1) Uh, gallery house.
(2) Big house; hall; guest hall.
(3) See "庌".

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Ji 2] [Guangzi Department] 　庌; Kangxi strokes: 7; Page number: page 343 28
[Tang Yun] Five cuts [Ji Yun] [Yunhui] [Zheng Yun] Cut under the language, sound on the teeth. [Said the text] Yeah. [Jade articles] She also. [Guang Yun] 㕔 also. [Release name] Dawu said 庑. It is said that the people in the hope are sorrowful.庌, righteousness, the one who is righteousness of the house is also. [Six Books and Gu] The gallery and the four are called 庌. 【Zhou Li·Xiaguan·King Shi】Xia Lama. [Note] 庌, 庑也. That’s why it’s so cool.　 [Ji Yun] Fish driving cut [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] Five driving cuts, sound of teeth going. The same meaning.　[Jiyun] Niu Jiaqie, Yinya.㡸庌, it’s not even.

yǎ, yà
